bibl.title: Zur Begriffspaar κόλαξ und παράσιτος. H.-G. Nesselraths These und P.G. McC. Browns Kritik.

BROWN, Menander, Fragments 745 and 746 K-T, Menander's Kolax, and Parasites and Flatterers in Greek Comedy, ZPE 92 (1992) pp. 91-107].
